title: How to Make Rhubarb Lemonade

steps.headline: Grate lemon zest off of 4 lemons and set aside.
Squeeze juice from 6 lemons until you have 1 cup of lemon juice.
Put 2 stalks of rhubarb, 1 cup of sugar, the lemon zest and 2 cups of water in a saucepan.
Bring the mixture to a boil until ingredients are well blended together.
steps.description: Make sure the rhubarb is tender.

steps.headline: Add the 1 cup of lemon juice to the mixture.
Chill mixture in the fridge for at least 3 hours.
Pour the mixture in a large glass or pitcher when ready to serve.
Add 2 more cups of water to the mixture.
To add effect and texture, add lemon slices or crushed ice.

text: Grate lemon zest off of 4 lemons and set aside.  Squeeze juice from 6 lemons until you have 1 cup of lemon juice.  Put 2 stalks of rhubarb, 1 cup of sugar, the lemon zest and 2 cups of water in a saucepan.  Bring the mixture to a boil until ingredients are well blended together. Make sure the rhubarb is tender. Strain the mixture.  Add the 1 cup of lemon juice to the mixture.  Chill mixture in the fridge for at least 3 hours.  Pour the mixture in a large glass or pitcher when ready to serve.  Add 2 more cups of water to the mixture.  To add effect and texture, add lemon slices or crushed ice.
